Posts.Content: thank you for sharing with me, as far as im aware it will be expanded untll the skin is a little larger than needed and then it will be removed and replaced with the tear drop.  hope it will get better but not sure  i can cope with this feeling I guess I want what I cant have.  Did you loose the feeling in your skin, as I have knpw feeling.
Posts.Title: recon with expander

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing. I'm having hopefully my first injection to expand tomorrow if my infection has cleared up enough. I will be asking questions as it seems that some people only have the implant whereas I seem to think I'm having this then it taken out and replaced. I didn't ask many question when I got my results as was in shock. So I'm making notes now. But atleast all your comments have made me feel more relaxed. Thank you xx
Posts.Title: recon with expander

Posts.Content: hi i've just had a mastectomy and reconstrution with expander 4 weeks ago and just wonder has anybody had the same.  I just dont know if what im feeling is the same as anybody else.  It feels like a lead balloon, I cant sleep and just need to undersatnd what happens next and does it ever feel normal if such a thing.  Hope someone can just reasure me.
Posts.Title: recon with expander
